attributes.action: Bring back compulsory National Service for a minimum 12 months for ages 18-20.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Put some respect and disipline back into the mind sets of our young adults!Less crime and more options for better quality of life,less unemployed, more motivation to suceed in life! It does not hurt to serve your country! Many other countrys still run National Service, why not ours?!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
